level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish rules of organization and procedure for the Public Trust for Drug Prevention and Children at Risk, pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 47-4004 (a) (2001).
The Trust was created to support non-profit organizations and District of Columbia government agencies in their drug prevention and children at risk programs for District of Columbia residents.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is section 5 of D.C. Law 8-246, the “District of Columbia Drug Prevention and Children at Risk Tax Check-off Amendment Act of 1990,” codified as amended at D.C. Official Code ยง 47-4004(a) (2001).
